title: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman Sheriff's Department Jerry Keith Reed death

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman Sheriff's Department Jerry Keith Reed death
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All records on Jerry Keith Reed who died April 24th. 2025.  He died in hospital after being transferred there from the McLennan County Jail. Internal investigations of his death and reports of his illness to the Jail Standards Commission.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

communications.subject: RE: Texas Public Information Act Request: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman Sheriff's Department Jerry Keith Reed death
communications.communication:
Good morning,
I will forward your request to the Sheriff’s Office.
Thank you

files.title: ~WRD0004
